Directions: You will now listen to a selection. Each selection will be followed by a series of spoken questions based on the content.

NOW GET READY TO LISTEN TO THE NEXT SELECTION.

choicesHtml: Kinder essen ihr Eis nie ganz auf.
Hundebesitzer geben ihren Hunden heimlich Eis unter dem Tisch.
